pkgmetadata.longdescription: Torchlight II is an action role-playing game developed by Runic Games. It is the sequel to Runic's 2009 ARPG, Torchlight, and features peer-to-peer multiplayer support and extended modding capabilities. Torchlight II takes place in a fantasy world where the player controls the hero in the story who intends to banish the evil from the world.
